column4: Question; How do I find the password for the actual root account on UNE Lucid? Because I'm trying to install a Lexmark printer driver and entering my OWN password isn't cutting it.
Blah. Oh well. Not the end of the world I suppose... Running the installer from a terminal with sudo should do the trick, I hope
oh joy. Sudo isn't working; All I get is "command not found", WHILE executing from the directory containing the file, AND after having chmod +x'd the file in question
